channel.title: Microsoft Microsoft Community Contributor Award on Nilesh Thakkar
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Microsoft Community Contributor Award on Nilesh Thakkar

item.title: Microsoft Community Contributor Award 2011
item.description: I am very happy to announce that I am one of many to receive this award. I consider this an honour to be recognized by Microsoft for my contribution to Asp.net Forums and look forward to continuing the same. Thanks Microsoft!
